text:
The Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare
Washington
April 13, 1961
Dear Mr, Hull*
This is to acknowledge your letter of recent
date and the enclosures, I have read them with
interest.
Sincerely,
/s/ Abraham Ribicoff
Secretary
Mr. Richard B. Hull
Chairmah, Board of Directors.
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C. â€™
